titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide States with flexibility with respect to providing premium assistance under the Medicaid program.
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide States with flexibility with respect to providing premium assistance under the Medicaid program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This bill allows the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) to waive specified requirements for a state Medicaid program to provide certain premium assistance if the CMS determines that such waivers are cost-effective.
